name: Harem
description: Paimon's Harem - A comprehensive character collection and marriage system for Discord servers. Features character rolling, claiming, marriage system, wishlists, and detailed statistics.
author: KermitAI
install_msg: Thank you for installing Paimon's Harem! Use `[p]harem` to get started. Don't forget to set up your character database and configure settings with `[p]harem admin`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including character collections, marriages, wishlists, and rolling statistics. Users can request deletion of their data by contacting the bot owner.
